@djeglin Yay! You could use Netlify Functions as your API layer for anything. Giving you all those nice things like automated builds, branch builds, preview builds, A/B testing, rollbacks.. that you enjoy already on your sites... but for #serverless functions. https://t.co/GDnnJHzTT9
